title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. The current design of the Project Properties Info page is causing issues on motif platforms. On Windows, the design looks fine. However, on motif platforms such as Solaris, AIX, and HPUX, the text fields are getting automatic borders, which incorrectly identify them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris, AIX, and HPUX, the fields have different colored backgrounds, making them stand out even more.
OB: On Windows, the Project Properties Info page displays properly without any issues. However, on motif platforms such as Solaris, AIX, and HPUX, the text fields in the Info page have automatic borders, which incorrectly identify them as user input targets. Furthermore, on Solaris, AIX, and HPUX, the fields have different colored backgrounds, which makes them stand out even more and affects the overall appearance of the page.
